channel.title: plakar on poolp.org
channel.description: Recent content in plakar on poolp.org

item.title: August 2019 report: Fion, Plakar and OpenSMTPD
item.description: Tl;DR: - small inprovements to the fion window manager - plakar is a backup utility I wrote a long time ago that I will share - tons of opensmtpd stuff, mostly filters and issues handling Shout outs to my patrons !
